name: Two wolves inside you or something
name_original: Two wolves inside you or something
description:
Start at the foot of a mountain, and control two wolves at the same time to help them reach the summit. To achieve this is no easy task, as the wolves must navigate through various jumps, spikes, doors and springs. But be quick - get up the platforms before the rising lava reaches you! Controls: WASD - Control first wolf Arrows up, left, down, right - Control second wolf

Made in 48 hours for GlobalGameJam2022 by:

  • Alex Driml - @busalonium - Code & Levels
  • April Guest - AprilGMusic (soundcloud) - Audio
  • Atticus McNaugton - @thornpuck - Art
  • Kiera Lord - @cratesmith - Code & Levels
  • Sean Worton - @sedawa - Art & Puns
